thread.title: VIDEO: Donald & Melania Trump Emerge on Inauguration Day
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Donald & Melania Trump Emerge on Inauguration Day

author: Just Jared
title: VIDEO: Donald & Melania Trump Emerge on Inauguration Day
text:
Donald Trump and his wife Melania head to a prayer service at St. John’s Episcopal Church in their first appearance on Inauguration Day. Ivanka Trump and her husband Jared Kushner were also seen arriving for the service.
The 70-year-old will be sworn in as the 45th President of the United States later today (January 20) on the steps of the Capitol building. 
Melania is drawing comparisons to Jacqueline Kennedy on #Inauguration Day in 1961 — you can see a photo here .
Watch the video of Donald Trump and his wife arriving to St. John’s Episcopal Church… 
Donald and Melania Trump, daughter Ivanka and son-in-law Jared Kushner, arrive at St. John's church #InaugurationDay https://t.co/Uap9G7g9O9 pic.twitter.com/FS4LjgqYPU 
— CBS News (@CBSNews) January 20, 2017 

FYI: Melania is wearing Ralph Lauren .
